sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtntrsmrcvlog ( requst_id , occrrnc_de , trsmrcv_se_code , cntc_id , provd_instt_id , provd_sys_id , provd_svc_id , requst_instt_id , requst_sys_id , requst_trnsmit_tm , requst_recptn_tm , rspns_trnsmit_tm , rspns_recptn_tm , result_code , result_mssage , frst_regist_pnttm , rqester_id ) VALUES ( #requstId# , #occrrncDe# , #trsmrcvSeCode# , #cntcId# , #provdInsttId# , #provdSysId# , #provdSvcId# , #requstInsttId# , #requstSysId# , #requstTrnsmitTm# , #requstRecptnTm# , #rspnsTrnsmitTm# , #rspnsRecptnTm# , #resultCode# , #resultMssage# , SYSDATE , #rqesterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtntrsmrcvlog SET requst_id = #requstId# , occrrnc_de = #occrrncDe# , trsmrcv_se_code = #trsmrcvSeCode# , cntc_id = #cntcId# , provd_instt_id = #provdInsttId# , provd_sys_id = #provdSysId# , provd_svc_id = #provdSvcId# , requst_instt_id = #requstInsttId# , requst_sys_id = #requstSysId# , requst_trnsmit_tm = #requstTrnsmitTm# , requst_recptn_tm = #requstRecptnTm# , rspns_trnsmit_tm = #rspnsTrnsmitTm# , rspns_recptn_tm = #rspnsRecptnTm# , result_code = #resultCode# , result_mssage = #resultMssage# , rqester_id = #rqesterId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND requst_id = #requstId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtntrsmrcvlog WHERE 1 = 1 AND requst_id = #requstId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT requst_id , occrrnc_de , trsmrcv_se_code , cntc_id , provd_instt_id , provd_sys_id , provd_svc_id , requst_instt_id , requst_sys_id , requst_trnsmit_tm , requst_recptn_tm , rspns_trnsmit_tm , rspns_recptn_tm , result_code , result_mssage , frst_regist_pnttm , rqester_id FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG WHERE requst_id = #requstId#

SELECT A.REQUST_ID , A.OCCRRNC_DE , A.TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , A.CNTC_ID , A.PROVD_INSTT_ID , A.PROVD_SYS_ID , A.PROVD_SVC_ID , A.REQUST_INSTT_ID , A.REQUST_SYS_ID , A.REQUST_TRNSMIT_TM , A.REQUST_RECPTN_TM , A.RSPNS_TRNSMIT_TM , A.RSPNS_RECPTN_TM , A.RESULT_CODE , A.RESULT_MSSAGE , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.RQESTER_ID FROM ( SELECT REQUST_ID , OCCRRNC_DE , TRSMRCV_SE_CODE , CNTC_ID , PROVD_INSTT_ID , PROVD_SYS_ID , PROVD_SVC_ID , REQUST_INSTT_ID , REQUST_SYS_ID , REQUST_TRNSMIT_TM , REQUST_RECPTN_TM , RSPNS_TRNSMIT_TM , RSPNS_RECPTN_TM , RESULT_CODE , RESULT_MSSAGE , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , RQESTER_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG WHERE 1=1
REQUST_ID = #searchKeyword#
OCCRRNC_DE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY REQUST_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNTRSMRCVLOG WHERE 1=1
REQUST_ID = #searchKeyword#
OCCRRNC_DE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
